importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The date when the incident occurred and was reported, indicating the timeliness and relevance of the event in current affairs.

keyTakeAways: A woman in her 20s in Osan, South Korea, attempted to kill a cockroach using an improvised flamethrower made from a lighter and flammable spray, resulting in a fire that spread to her apartment block.
The fire led to the death of a Chinese national woman in her 30s, who fell from the fifth-floor window during a failed escape attempt due to thick smoke blocking the stairwell.
The woman's husband survived and managed to escape by climbing to the next building, while the woman was unable to do so and died from smoke inhalation or trauma.
Eight other residents suffered smoke inhalation injuries due to the fire.
The incident highlights a dangerous trend of using flamethrowers or improvised methods to kill cockroaches, popularized by social media videos.
South Korean police have opened an investigation and may seek an arrest warrant for the woman, charging her with accidental fire and death by negligence.
The building has 32 residential units and commercial shops on the ground floor, indicating a high-risk environment for fire spread due to shared structures and proximity.

summaryOfNewsArticle: A woman in her 20s in Osan, South Korea, attempted to kill a cockroach using an improvised flamethrower made from a lighter and flammable spray, which ignited a fire in her apartment building. The blaze resulted in the death of a Chinese national woman in her 30s, who fell from the fifth-floor window during an escape attempt due to thick smoke blocking the stairwell. The woman's husband survived and escaped by climbing to the next block, while eight other residents suffered smoke inhalation injuries. Police are investigating and may seek an arrest warrant for the woman, charging her with accidental fire and death by negligence. This incident reflects a dangerous trend of using flamethrowers or DIY methods to kill pests, popularized by social media, and underscores the risks of unregulated household pest control practices.
title: South Korea: Woman trying to kill cockroach sets apartment block on fire
